quizDescription.text: Note: This is an open book exam. Answer all the questions

Section A : 12*0.5 = 6 Marks
Download Bike Sharing Data Answer following questions from hour.csv.

questionText.text: How many rows of data (observations) are in this dataset?
How many variables are in this dataset?
Find the difference between maximum and minimum temperature in this dataset ?( consider 2 numbers after decimal point )
Count the number of working days(having value=1 in that column) in this dataset?
How many records are there for springer season?
What is the month and year of the median date in our dataset? (Write in the format mm,yyyy )
Count of total rental bikes from 2012-5-18 to 2012-5-21(both dates are inclusive) in this dataset?
In which month and year the average rental bikes is low? (Write in the format mm,yyyy )
In 2011 which weekday the average of  rental bikes is high?
In general, does it look like rental bikes increases or decreases from 2011 â€“ 2012? (Write increase, decreases,equal )
For what proportion of hours in 2012 was more than the average of the count of rental bikes. ( consider 4 numbers after decimal point )
Find in each interval of ([0-8), [8-18),[18-0)) hours the average of count of rental bikes in year 2012.( consider 3 numbers after decimal point  with comma separated(x,y,z))
